name: Monster Truck 4x4 TDM Derby
description:
We bring the newest Monster Truck 4x4 TDM derby for you.

This game has a lot of features including racing with enemies and Team Death Match Mode.

Get ready for the battle of teams in Monster Truck Racing Derby.

Features of TDM Monster Truck Derby:
- 30+ Monster Trucks
- Guns to shoot Bullets and Rockets at the enemies
- Awesome Physics with realistic controls
- Derby Mode, TDM Mode, and Racing mode with a lot of new features
- Single Monster Truck Purchase option
- Enemy killing reward.
- Nitros to boost speed in racing mode
- Realistic graphics
- Smooth Controls
